content:
That's a great plan! Implementing a clear lead capture and follow-up strategy will help you effectively convert attendees into customers. I think we've covered all the necessary aspects to ensure a successful demo experience at the Medical Device Expo.

Before we wrap up, I just want to clarify that you feel confident about preparing for the 2 hours of Q&A for the Packaging Industry Conference in Chicago, and how that experience will help you prepare for the Medical Device Expo.

Also, are there any other questions or concerns you have regarding the demo experience, lead capture, or follow-up strategy that we haven't discussed yet?
